resources.string: Hello World, I\'m H. David Gleaton
My name is David Gleaton, and I\'m from Pawleys Island, SC
My favorite programming language I would say is python. Even though I just started using it heavily last semester, it grew on me quick!
My Hobbies are: Reading, playing DnD, playing tabletop/videogames, and collecting vinyl records
My favorite food has to be the fried seafood my family makes back home. It is honestly the best, they deserve 3 Michelin stars.
A fun fact about me is that I have 3 natural colors on my head: Red, Brown, and white!
